name: trliswlk
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0)))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2, c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2, Fun(`' c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ↔(c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2 ∧ Fun(`' c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 ↔(c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2 ∧ Fun(`' c0)))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))

comment: A trail is a walk. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jan-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
